system.description:
When you select this archetype at level 1, the damage dealt by your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.t4fBlBaiSejL8KVX]{Sanguine Transference} is necrotic damage.

Additionally, choose one of the following:

Death Rattle

As a bonus action, you unleash a horrifying death rattle that seems to settle into the very bones of your foes. Choose a number of creatures equal to your proficiency bonus that you can see within 30 feet of you. Those creatures must succeed on a Constitution saving throw versus your maneuver DC or be rattled until the start of your next turn. You may use this ability a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus per short rest.

Vengeful Spirit

The fury of a wronged soul floods into you. When an enemy creature hits you with an attack, you may immediately use your reaction to inflict 1d8 + half your bloodblade level (rounded down) points of necrotic damage. You may use this ability a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus per long rest.
